review: Clean and tidy ambience with supporting staff, friendly doctor with quick diagnosis and effective treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had a wonderful experience with root canal therapy.
Was in a lot of pain when I approached the doctor,but she handled my case with a lot of care.very satisfied with my treatment and all the sittings went off very smoothly.
Recommended for a good and friendly dental experience

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went with sever toothache. The diagnosis of cause was done within no time. My pain got relieved in very first sitting. Staff is ver polite and treatm was done very patientlt. Withno waiting timr. I will definitely recommend dr shruti to all.

tags: None
review: In my first meeting with Shruti, I understood that yeah, this is one dentist who could help me with my Bruxism. The check up was done that smartly. The night guards were delivered right on time and my cavities were filled so very well! I'm surely impressed. Brilliant work!

tags: None
review:
Had a wonderful experience visiting for the second time here. Got my sensitivity treatment done with the use of lasers 
It's the first time I've heard the use of lasers in dentistry and I was extremely fascinated with the idea itself which lead me to begin with the treatment. The treatment was minimally painful and all

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She was quick with her diagnosis and helped me with treatment options. I am happy with my experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went with discoloration and crooked tooth. Didnt want braces so Dr suggested aesthetics.. Experience was very good.. Dr was very friendly and I am very much happy with my Smile. A must recommended Visit for any Dental Problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: With doctor Shruti I felt in a friendly nature. She is a excellent and responsible doctor. Her treatment was satisfactory. Thanks for the treatment.

tags: None
review: Doctor is very cooperative and helpful..*** *** ****** ********* ** ****** Nice experience. Nice treatment and followup

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: I went with tooth ache and swelling on right side of my jaw. Doctor was very polite and explained me the pain was from my wisdom tooth, so I need extraction for the same. I had previous very bad experience of extraction so was little afraid to get. But tooth was removed painless and no post extraction swelling. Thanks Dr Shruti for wonderful work. Highly recommended.
